articles.author: Emily Yahr
articles.title: How the ‘American Idol’ front-runner actually won the show - The Washington Post
articles.description: Jamal Roberts won “American Idol” after a season of impressing judges Carrie Underwood, Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan, beating out John Foster and Breanna Nix.
articles.content: Jamal Roberts certainly seemed like a front-runner on American Idol this season, and judge Luke Bryan had a gut feeling he would take home the crown, but that never guarantees anything more than two … [+5321 chars]
